description:
Sam Tuke: TheyDontWantYou.To

Download video: https://archive.org/details/12SAT011615-theydontwantyouto

How can we make freedom interesting to young people before it's too late? TheyDontWantYou.To is a brand new campaign that attempts to do just that. By highlighting the practical cost of sacrificing freedom, and getting people talking about everyday experiences of living without it, we're increasing it's value for non-technical people and participation in digital activism by non-technical people. Sam introduces campaign materials and explains how you can participate.
